short_summary: Supply of Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircraft.
description: The Department of National Defence is seeking to acquire 5 items for various aircraft through Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. An RFP has been issued based on the following procurement details.
full_summary:
# Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircrafts

## Solicitation Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) has released a solicitation, W8485-258242/A, under a Supply Arrangement contract W8485-184741 Series. The purpose of this solicitation is to acquire replacement parts for various aircraft.

## Tender Overview

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca
	+ (819) 939-6082

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-258242/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-10
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-17T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-10
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-08-15
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Overview

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

## Participating Suppliers

* The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:
	+ B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
	+ Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
	+ Tower Aerospace Inc.
	+ Genaire Limited
	+ Unisource Technology Inc.
	+ Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
	+ Tulmar Safety
	+ M1 Composites Technology
	+ Rockwell Collins Canada
	+ TSL Aerospace Technologies

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents

* RFP documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting officer to the qualified SA holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.
* Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of RFP documents.

## Supplier Inquiries

* Supplier inquiries should be submitted to the Contracting Authority listed above:
	+ Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
	+
